column1: Uchi////I then ordered the Ora King Salmon
column4: Kori Kaki and the Foie Gras nageri. They were out of a fish
column5: and they went ahead and substituted it with a different fish without consulting me
column6: the kori kaki was just ok
column7: and the uni was quite possibly the smallest serving I have ever gotten. The fish wasn't out of this world delicious or mind blowingly fresh. I wasn't given soy sauce or told if the fish was already sauced
column8: it was just a weird dining experience.
